name: Herman 2
description:
* It was an Xbox 360 exclusive that is not currently available.
* Tiny Subversions put "Herman" on their list of "16 Xbox Live Indie Games you should play before I die."
* Diehard Gamefan rated it "ENJOYABLE GAME," and also called the music "sublime," and "very, very well done."

"Herman 2" is a significant leap forward from "Herman."
